https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gKkbHvM7hyWD4lQOOraSB4K2RXp.jpg A Danish teacher takes a job in Greenland and tries to overcome the animosity of the tight-knit locals through a series of errors that help him embrace the snow-covered life. A Polar Year
